title: How to Talk to Your Shadow? (ft. AstroEden)
album: Carousel (An Examination of the Shadow, Creekflow, and its Life as an Afterthought)
lyrics: Step right up! Step right up! My little ponies, your childhood bestowed you your wings. Your memories serve more than fond keepsakes. Awaiting you in this very hall is the memento of all mementos.
The dusk of your visage, with a mind of its own?
In this very place, you will learn to speak to your shadow.
Your faithful companion, trailing in your stead at all times, endowed a new life, saturated in the light that left you.
Should your brave little shadow respond to you, what do you think it will say?
It has known all your feelings and seen all your days. Aren’t you excited? Draw from the innovations of antiquity.
With your shadow, become all which trailed before you!
After all, it’s never left your side.
The one and only DJ Pon3
